COMP.5211 - Application Testing and Maintenance - S1 - TG - 2018


Course Aim:

The aim of this course is to provide students with the skills to publish a web applicati and produce user documentation and training material.


Learning Outcomes:

  • Migrate a web solution from development to a testing environment.
  • Create and use a test plan for a web solution.
  • Move a solution from a test environment to a live platform.
  • Configure applications to meet requirements and obtain client acceptances.
  • Produce user training material.

Topics:

  • Test plans including functional testing, usability testing, standards compliance testingli>
  • Set-up and migration from development to testing environment.
  • Performing testing and maintenance in accordance with a software development paradigm.
  • Carrying out functional testing of applications in multiple user environments wicombinations of browsers and devices.
  • Measuring usability and compliance to standards.
  • Ensuring a solution works according to specifications.
  • Client acceptance process for a development project.
  • User training requirements and documentation

Assessment Requirements Due Date Weighting
Assessment 1 Analysis Assignment 6/04/2018 30%
Assessment 2 Design Assignment 1/05/2018 30%
Assessment 3 Implementation Assignment 27/05/2018 40%

Assignments:

Assignment 1: https://docs.google.com/document18MlXCHFski-eHUuWFOs9klYQL3RuLVhEWIEfnsNpqs8/edit#

Assignment 2: https://bitbucket.org/marisaamy/10002444-5211-assign2/src/master/

Assignment 3: https://docs.google.com/document1B-7WUTtjpIT9QWi25FXbBu3ps2KjZF6NVsgYEyJc3tk/edit#heading=h.ed1n8xs854st


Toi Ohomai Institute of Technology
